name: Night Out (MustacheSkulls)
description:
THE GAME DOESN'T HAVE A FULLSCREEN OPTION YET BUT WE ARE WORKING TO FIX THE ISSUE! WE'LL UPDATE THE GAME SOON.

A short visual novel made for O2A2 JAM (Again!)
It's a short story about a last meeting between you and your delinquent cat friend.

It contains:
-1000 words
-1 Background image
-1 BGM
-1 Sprite
-3 endings

This game was made for The 2nd O2A2 jam on Itch.io. It was a pleasure to work on this project which is our second Visual Novel

A game by: MustacheSkulls Games
Written and Programmed by: TeasingMasterVi
Sprite art, Background, GUI by: MustacheSkulls
Promo Artist/Banner artist: CeHamato
Editor: SacrificedtoRNGesus
Composer: EltonMSO

Special thanks to Sortros Phoresia for coming up with Moggie's name.

For MAC:
If you are running iOS and are experiencing problems opening game with an error related to your security settings, please see this Apple support article for a simple solution.
